name: Angel Droid (itch)
description:
Vampire Survivors meets Magicka in this crafting-driven power fantasy.

Delve into the world of [NOT_NULL] to discover over 28,000 craftable combat abilities. Use these abilities to fight demons, and traverse through the darkness of the human consciousness. As you fight, you will level up and gain rewards to power-up your abilities and craft new ones.

Play as a vigilante named [I_AM], who's hope is to make the world better by connecting with broken minds around the city. To accomplish this, [I_AM] builds a small robot called the Angel Droid, a drone that can interlink with any subconscious mind. Your goal is to quell the demons infesting minds across the city. You do not know what will happen if you get caught.

Angel Droid is a game of crafting experimentation, powered by a gameplay loop with high replay value. If you enjoy roguelikes, crafting games, or arcade games, you should definitely play this! We will be adding more abilities, rewards, and permanent bonuses to the game. Stay tuned for updates!

NOTE: You must download the itch.io app to play this game. Download Angel Droid with the itch.io app now!
